src_original: Candrasūtra Wal_1 evaṁ mayā śrutam / ekasamayaṁ bhagavāṁ caṁpāyāṁ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyās tīre /
yo hy andhakāre nabhasi prabhākaro vairocano … / rāho śaśāṅkaṁ grasa māntarīkṣe
Wal_7 … / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ / saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ //
Wal_8 tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ / adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe //
Wal_9 kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ //
Wal_10 rāhur avocat // saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet //
Wal_2 tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asurendreṇa sarvaṁ candramaṇḍalam āvṛtaṁ /
Wal_4 namas te buddha vīrāstu vipramuktāya savataḥ /
Wal_5 loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ / rāhoś candramasaṁ muñca buddhā lokānukaṁpakāḥ //
